sourcesContent:
import { FC, useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { anonymousUsers, businessUsers, personalUsers } from "./data"; import "./style.css"; import { saturnIntegration } from "./integration"; // template: https://salahtml.uxper.co/home-chat-service.html type UserType = "anonymous" | "business" | "personal"; const saturnLandingPageLink = "https://saturnhq.io/"; const getRandomUserIndex = () => { return Math.floor(Math.random() * 10); }; export const App: FC = () => { const [userTypeToLoad, setUserTypeToLoad] = useState("personal"); const [userIndex, setUserIndex] = useState(0); useEffect(() => { const { userType = "personal", index = 0 } = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("saturn_demo_user")) ?? {}; setUserIndex(index); setUserTypeToLoad(userType); }, []); useEffect(() => { console.log({ userIndex, userTypeToLoad }); let userData; switch (userTypeToLoad) { case "personal": userData = personalUsers[userIndex]; break; case "business": userData = businessUsers[userIndex]; break; case "anonymous": userData = anonymousUsers[userIndex]; break; } if (!userData) { console.error("No user found!", { userIndex, userData }); return; } saturnIntegration.init(userData); }, [userIndex, userTypeToLoad]); const handleOnChange = (e) => { const userType = e?.target?.value as UserType; const index = getRandomUserIndex(); console.log({ userType }); localStorage.setItem( "saturn_demo_user", JSON.stringify({ userType, index }) ); setUserIndex(index); setUserTypeToLoad(userType); }; return ( <>
{/* BEGIN SITE HEADER */}
